data.text:
@912CroozeFM But Ugandan authorities are the one demanding PCR test results before entering the country!!
And surprisingly, the PCR is only required by Ugandan authorities at Katuna, while those at Mirama do not require them! I wonder why?!
@912CroozeFM Who is still blaming Rwanda for allegedly closing the border and suffocating movement? forever hold your peace
@912CroozeFM Eeeeeee but they should be have PCR
